titles.title: American Manufacturing Disaster Relief Act of 2010

To amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to prohibit the United States Agency for International Development from procuring manufactured articles to provide disaster relief assistance or emergency relief assistance in a foreign country unless the articles are manufactured in such foreign country or in certain circumstances in the United States or third countries.
American Manufacturing Disaster Relief Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: American Manufacturing Disaster Relief Act of 2010 - Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to prohibit the United States Agency for International Development (USAID) from procuring manufactured articles for disaster or emergency assistance in a foreign country unless the articles are manufactured in such foreign country or, under certain circumstances, in the United States or third countries.
